## 0.1.4 (2017-11-16)

* No need for whitespace after *bold*, _italics_ and ~strikethrough~

<a name="0.1.3"></a>
## 0.1.3 (2017-10-18)

* Fix auto-linking for messages generated by Slack by supporting '<https://github.com|GitHub>'-style links
